title: 86x16: Wedding Gifts and Waiver of the Public Financial Reporting Requirements
summary:
An employee may request a waiver of the public reporting requirements of for wedding gifts he and his future spouse received by following the procedures in 5 C.F.R. § 734.303(g)(2). Such gifts are not automatically exempt from reporting requirements.  

Notes: [cites former 5 U.S.C. app. § 202]
